com.brightcove.player.event

Componente de interfaz

  • Todas las clases de implementación conocidas:
    ResumenBotónControlador , ResumenComponente , ResumenFuera de líneaCatálogo , AdCuePointComponent , AdOverlayHandler , Analítica , AudioTracksButtonController , BaseVideoView , BrightcoveAudioTracksController , BrightcoveCastMediaManager , BrightcoveClosedCaptioningController , BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView , BrightcoveExoPlayerTextureVideoView , BrightcoveExoPlayerVideoView , BrightcoveMediaController , BrightcovePlayer , BrightcovePluginManager , BrightcoveSeekBarController , BrightcoveMostrarOcultarControlador , BrightcoveTexturaVideoVer , BrightcoveVideoView , SubtítulosBotónControlador , Catalogar , CloseButtonController , CompanionAdHandler , DefaultSourceSelectionController , ExoAdPlayer , ExoPlayerSourceSelectionController , ExoPlayerVideoDisplayComponent , FastForwardButtonController , FreeWheelController , FullScreenButtonController , GetPlaylistTask , GetVideoTask , GoogleCastComponent , GoogleIMAComponent , LifecycleUtil , LiveButtonController , LiveVideoOrchestrator , LoadCaptionsService , LoadCaptionsTask , LoadImageTask , OfflineCatalog , OmnitureComponente , PictureInPictureButtonController , PlayButtonController , PlayerOptionsButtonController , PulseComponent , RewindButtonController , SeekButtonController , SeekManager , SSAIComponente , ThumbnailComponent , UIManager , UiTimedTracker , VideoDisplayComponent, VideoPlaybackController , VideoStillDisplayComponent , VRButtonController

    @Emite(eventos={"sample","event","list"} ) @EscuchaPara(eventos={"play","stop"} ) interfaz pública Componente
    Las clases que implementan esta interfaz estarán diseñadas para trabajar con el sistema EventEmitter Las clases que implementan esta interfaz deben usar las anotaciones Emits y ListensFor
